attributes.review: My husband and I were strong Trump supporters so we downloaded this app. It was working perfectly fine and then it crashed and deleted EVERYTHING on our ipad. I do not know what kind of sick joke this app is but I highly recommend never downloading it.....EVER!!! I think my husband and I will be reconsidering our political choices from now on.
